summary: A man living in the towering shadow of his aging father finds it difficult to start a new chapter in his life by marrying his girlfriend and moving to California.
cast: Melvyn Douglas|Gene Hackman|Dorothy Stickney|Estelle Parsons|Elizabeth Hubbard|Lovelady Powell|Daniel Keyes|Conrad Bain|Jon Richards|Nikki Counselman|Carol Peterson|Sloane Shelton|James Karen|Gene Williams|Jean Dexter|Valerie Ogden|Beverly Penberthy
